title: World Validation
description: Validates world-level settings including experiments, version requirements, and metadata. These settings affect how the world loads and what features are available.

fields.title: Beta APIs
fields.description: Indicates whether the Beta APIs experiment is enabled in the world. Required for using experimental script API features.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains a boolean indicating experiment status

fields.title: Data Driven Items
fields.description: Indicates whether the Data Driven Items experiment is enabled. Required for certain custom item features.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains a boolean indicating experiment status

fields.title: Deferred Preview
fields.description: Indicates whether the Deferred Technical Preview experiment is enabled. Used for testing upcoming rendering features.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains a boolean indicating experiment status

fields.title: Base Game Version
fields.description: The base game version specified for the world. Determines which Minecraft features and behaviors are available.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the version array as a string [major, minor, patch]

fields.title: World Name
fields.description: The display name of the world shown to players.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the world name string

fields.title: World Description
fields.description: The description text for the world, shown in world selection screens.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the world description string
